name: Sammich Stack
description:
Hello and thank you for playing my GMTK jam game!

Instructions

  • Click and drag toppings onto sammich bun.
  • Join as many ingredients as you can together.
  • Don't let sammich touch floor.
  • Once sammich part touches something you have to let it go.
  • Put top bun on to complete sammich
  • *Hint stack topping side by side to create wide base for bigger sammich*

Additional Info

I was only person who made this game, the time was about 8 hours to make the game. Sound is by me as well but I have one song that I did not make.

Orchestral Metal by Theo Teravainen [royalty free song (permission given to me by artist to use in game)]
